verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD שְׁמַ֬ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti, my prayer הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah give ear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to תַּחֲנוּנַ֑י <S%H8469><s%> ta-cha-nu-Nai; to my supplications בֶּאֱמֻנָתְךָ֥ <S%H530><s%> be-'e-mu-na-te-Cha in thy faithfulness עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni, answer בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> be-tzid-ka-Te-cha. me [and] in thy righteousness

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo And enter בְ֭מִשְׁפָּט <S%H4941><s%> Ve-mish-pot not into judgment אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha; with thy servant כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no יִצְדַּ֖ק <S%H6663><s%> yitz-Dak be justified לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha for in thy sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all manner חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> Chai. shall no man living

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רָ֘דַ֤ף <S%H7291><s%> ra-Daf hath persecuted אוֹיֵ֨ב׀ <S%H341><s%> o-Yev For the enemy נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my soul דִּכָּ֣א <S%H1792><s%> dik-Ka down לָ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> La-'a-retz to the ground חַיָּתִ֑י <S%H2416><s%> chai-ya-Ti; my life הוֹשִׁיבַ֥נִי <S%H3427><s%> ho-shi-Va-ni he hath made me to dwell בְ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <S%H4285><s%> ve-ma-cha-shak-Kim, in darkness כְּמֵתֵ֥י <S%H4191><s%> ke-me-Tei dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. as those that have been long

וַתִּתְעַטֵּ֣ף <S%H5848><s%> vat-tit-'at-Tef overwhelmed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within רוּחִ֑י <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi; Therefore is my spirit בְּ֝תוֹכִ֗י <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chi, within יִשְׁתּוֹמֵ֥ם <S%H8074><s%> yish-to-Mem me is desolate לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi. within me my heart

זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי <S%H2142><s%> za-Char-ti I remember יָמִ֨ים׀ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim the days מִקֶּ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem, of old הָגִ֥יתִי <S%H1897><s%> ha-Gi-ti I meditate בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> po-'o-Le-cha; on all thy works בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Seh on the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha of thy hands אֲשׂוֹחֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7878><s%> a-so-Che-ach. I muse

פֵּרַ֣שְׂתִּי <S%H6566><s%> pe-Ras-ti I stretch forth יָדַ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai my hands אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha; to you נַפְשִׁ֓י׀ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi unto thee my soul כְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> ke-'e-retz- land עֲיֵפָ֖ה <S%H5889><s%> 'a-ye-Fah [thirsteth] after thee as a thirsty לְךָ֣ le-Cha סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

מַ֘הֵ֤ר <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her me speedily עֲנֵ֨נִי׀ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni Hear יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD כָּלְתָ֪ה <S%H3615><s%> kal-Tah faileth ר֫וּחִ֥י <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi my spirit אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> tas-Ter hide פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha not thy face מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <S%H4911><s%> ve-nim-Shal-ti, from me lest I be like עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- who יֹ֥רְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> Yo-re-dei unto them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> Vor. into the pit

הַשְׁמִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <S%H8085><s%> hash-Mi-'E-ni Cause me to hear בַבֹּ֨קֶר׀ <S%H1242><s%> vab-Bo-ker in the morning חַסְדֶּךָ֮ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-Cha thy lovingkindness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בְךָ֪ ve-Cha בָ֫טָ֥חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> va-Ta-che-ti for in thee do I trust הוֹדִיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3045><s%> ho-di-'E-ni, cause me to know דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- the way ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> zu wherein אֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech; walk כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֵ֝לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> 'E-lei-cha to נָשָׂ֥אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti for I lift up נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. my soul

הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י׀ <S%H341><s%> me-'o-ye-Vai from mine enemies יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about כִסִּֽתִי׃ <S%H3680><s%> chis-Si-ti. I flee unto thee to hide

לַמְּדֵ֤נִי׀ <S%H3925><s%> lam-me-De-ni Teach לַֽעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot me to do רְצוֹנֶךָ֮ <S%H7522><s%> re-tzo-ne-Cha thy will כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אֱל֫וֹהָ֥י <S%H433><s%> e-Lo-Hai God רוּחֲךָ֥ <S%H7307><s%> ru-cha-Cha thy spirit טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah; [is] good תַּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <S%H5148><s%> tan-Che-ni, lead בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz me into the land מִישֽׁוֹר׃ <S%H4334><s%> mi-Shor. of uprightness

לְמַֽעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'an- the sake שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha for thy name's יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי <S%H2421><s%> te-chai-Ye-ni; Quicken בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֓׀ <S%H6666><s%> be-tzid-ka-te-Cha sake for thy righteousness' תוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> to-Tzi sake bring מִצָּרָ֣ה <S%H6869><s%> mitz-tza-Rah out of trouble נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. my soul

וּֽבְחַסְדְּךָ֮ <S%H2617><s%> u-ve-chas-de-Cha And of thy mercy תַּצְמִ֪ית <S%H6789><s%> tatz-Mit cut off אֹ֫יְבָ֥י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai mine enemies וְֽ֭הַאֲבַדְתָּ <S%H6><s%> Ve-ha-'a-vad-ta and destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all צֹרֲרֵ֣י <S%H6887><s%> tzo-ra-Rei all them that afflict נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul כִּ֝֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha. for I [am] thy servant
